data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Poltava, Ukraine.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Poltava, Ukraine
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 55,960 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Poltava to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Poltava that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Kurd, Kurmanji people.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Poltava to exponentially multiply disciples.
Jesus, 1,544,100 people live in the state of Poltava. Please, give them 308 new simple churches this year.
Jesus, please help the 55,960 believers in the state of Poltava to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
